      • enableTrackingProtection

        public void enableTrackingProtection(mozilla.components.concept.engine.EngineSession.TrackingProtectionPolicy policy)

        See EngineSession.enableTrackingProtection

        Note that specifying tracking protection policies at run-time is not supported by class SystemEngine. Tracking protection is always active for all URLs provided in domain_blacklist.json and domain_overrides.json, which both support specifying categories.

        See Also:
        class SystemEngine
